description: The maximum_password_lifetime parameter in SAP HANA specifies the number of days after which a user's password expires.

queries.name: q_password_policy_maximum_password_lifetime
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'maximum_password_lifetime'

actions.description: The parameter maximum_password_lifetime is set greater than the default recommended value of 182. The parameter will enforce security measures to change the user password periodically. Please review the parameters and enforce security measures.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
